name: Mochi Clicker
description:
Oh no! Your mochi is melting! Luckily, your hands are SUPER cold and will keep the mochi at a good temperature. Just keep clicking the mochi for long enough and it will be ok! You were also thirsty and took a walk to the local cafe for a coffee!

[THIS GAME IS NOT A VIRUS, I USED TURBOWARP, WHICH IS A EXPORTER FOR SCRATCH PROJECTS!!! AND FOR SOME REASON, THE PROJECT ISN'T TRUSTED BY MICROSOFT!!!]
